segments.text: So , where are you going to spend your winter vacation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I ’ m going to meet my girlfriend in Thailand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have a girlfriend in Thailand ? Interesting . How come I have never heard of that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually it will be my first time to meet her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean you haven ’ t seen her before ? Then , how could she be your girlfriend ? Maybe you don ’ t even know her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s true . But we have known each other over the Internet for a few months now . Actually we are on an intimate level . We even plan to be engaged next month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Congratulations ! It ’ s good to follow your heart . But I just didn ’ t expect to be so fast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Internet is making interaction much faster . People are getting to know each other much more quickly this way .
segments.speaker: S2
